mapper.select: SELECT board_no, board_title, board_date FROM ( SELECT board_no, board_title, board_date FROM mks_board WHERE board_type = 0 ORDER BY board_date desc ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 2
SELECT board_no, board_type, board_title, mks_id, board_date FROM mks_board WHERE board_type = 0
SELECT board_no, board_title, mks_id, board_date, board_content FROM mks_board WHERE 1 = 1 AND board_no = #{board_no}
SELECT hp_code, dept_name FROM mks_dept WHERE hp_code = #{hp_code}
SELECT doc_name, dept_name, doc_position, doc_education FROM mks_doctor WHERE doc_name = #{doc_name} AND doc_name LIKE '%'||#{doc_name}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mks_reserve (mem_memcode, res_memo, sch_code, res_qrcode, doc_name, res_time, doc_code, hp_code, dept_name, dept_code, sch_date, hp_name) VAlUES (#{mem_memcode},#{res_memo},#{sch_code},#{res_qrcode},#{doc_name},#{res_time},#{doc_code},#{hp_code},#{dept_name},#{dept_code},#{sch_date},#{hp_name})
mapper.select: SELECT mem_memcode, hp_name, dept_name, doc_name, sch_date, res_qrcode FROM mks_reserve WHERE mem_memcode = #{mem_memcode}
SELECT o.mks_id FROM mks_online o, mks_member m WHERE o.mem_memcode = m.mem_memcode AND o.mks_id = #{mks_id}
SELECT m.mem_socialnum FROM mks_online o, mks_member m WHERE o.mem_memcode = m.mem_memcode AND m.mem_socialnum = #{mem_socialnum}
